title: Silverstone
description: Secret agent Silverstone teams up with Hawk, Artemus, and Mission Omega Matrix to protect the world from every kind of villain.
altHero: Silverstone with a laser pointed at his chest
alt1: Silverstone with Hawk who holds a disc
alt2: Silverstone and Hawk are back to back and a purple energy ring bursts outward
alt3: Silverstone reaches for a glowing orange orb floating nearby
